post.body: Is that just you or is that an actual side effect of the medicine?
Not yet, apparently they are saving the best for last ^^;
BECK is great if you don't have it already!
I'm happy to have snow, I love it!
You say that like Mohawk biker #3 isn't cool.
snow just started coming down here as well.
NYC should be seeing some snow soon too.
The Academy agrees with you.
They sent one about the awards but not nominating or voting yet, just changes for the coming awards.
Our editorials tend to get the most hits.
Personally, I never get too discouraged with hits or comments but I think it is important to try and communicate with others.
I owned many!
There, there it'll be okay.
If one can get stuff off the iPod one can surely get it off the Zune.
Over the month.
I didn't have much of a problem with the panels I really wanted to see, but maybe that is just me.
We are so damn chatty.
I don't know how detailed you need, but we have some pics in our reviews http://tinyurl.com/7bloej http://tinyurl.com/79x6qg
Poirot is the only fictional character to get an obituary in the New York Times.
I shall make cookies today!
Being someone who has had John answer questions I have asked, he will e-mail you if he is using yours specifically.
Been reading The Name of the Wind by Patrick Rothfuss, it is very good and getting to the point where I don't want to do anything but read.
It is so nice to enjoy the Answerman column again.
Latest investigations up, this week: Object of Desire, Red Blinds the Foolish, Bartender, Maria-holic, Basilisk, Harlock, Haruhi
Watched As Good As It Gets last night, I am in a movie watching mood. I am busting out all my favorites this weekend.
Still don't see what is gained by it.
I find very little to be gained by being negative.
I give up. I must watch Aladdin.
YAY! The site is back up.
I get an itch to write some more on the blog and the server is having troubles? :P
Our visitor average has increased by about 500 people in the last two months!
Watched first 3 eps of Time of Eve, interesting little show. Like the low key humor mixed with an exploration of the human condition.
It is done, I have purchased it for 3 months. We will probably blog about this experiment.
With the addition of Natsume Yuujinchou I may have to get that crunchyroll subscription.
Wow NYCC is announcing MORE guests of honor this month, there are going to be so many people!
I <3 Linotype Font Explorer X
Latest investigations up: Seduce Me After the Show, Berserk, Steam Detectives, Kannagi, Brave Story, The Manzai Comics
Yo we are on Skype now! reversethieves!
Skype is officially dumb but it works on my MAC.
OMG, why am I up already?
